title: PICS: Motsoaledi Setumo’s breath-taking holiday in Bali
text:
PICS: Motsoaledi Setumo’s breath-taking holiday in Bali share this

Actress Motsoaledi Setumo is living it up in Bali with her best friends.

The 28-year-old is staying at one of the most popular and beautiful resorts on the island, The All-Inclusive Club Med Bali resort.

Read more: 3 photos of Simphiwe Ngema’s Thailand holiday!

The trio have been flooding their Instagram feeds and stories with pictures and videos of what they’ve been up to while on holiday.From elephant riding, to having beautiful picturesque views of historic buildings, snorkelling and so much more.

Read more: PICS: Liesl Laurie’s breathtaking Bali vacation

Check out some of their pictures here:
description: Actress Motsoaledi Setumo is living it up in Bali with her best friends.
